songs.title: Intro
songs.lyrics:
Ok, so let me give you some things to taste
And you tell me what you think
Alright, taste this

Is that good?
Real good?

Okay, you like this
Alright, now wait... taste this

Does it quench your thirst?
Now try some candy

Sweet, right?
Sugary

Okay, now wait, taste this

Taste that
Go ahead

Okay, now I'm gonna give you something...
Really good
